Name: F.I.S.H.
Description: F.I.S.H. General Category Tools Tech Tier Orbital Tech Description Fish Identification and Scanning Hardware. A handheld device that scans the waterbodies at the present location for fish like creatures. Flavor Text A glorified fish finder. Statistics Weight 1.0 Kg
